mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.nickname as owner_nickname FROM assets a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.owner_id = u.id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.*, u.nickname as owner_nickname FROM assets a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.owner_id = u.id WHERE a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR a.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT a.*, u.nickname as owner_nickname FROM assets a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.owner_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assets (name, type, serial_number, description, details, owner_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{serialNumber}, #{description}, #{details}, #{ownerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE assets SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, serial_number = #{serialNumber}, description = #{description}, details = #{details}, owner_id = #{ownerId} WHERE id = #{id}
